title: Toast Turns up the Heat on Slow Builds With Gradle DPE
author: Todd R Weiss
description: Toast was able to slash build times from 78 to 27 minutes using Developer Productivity Engineering, revolutionizing their release cycles and getting features to customers faster.
cntitle: Toast 通过 Gradle DPE 加速缓慢构建
cndescription: Toast 通过使用开发者生产力工程，成功地将构建时间从 78 分钟缩短到 27 分钟，彻底改变了他们的发布周期，并更快地将功能交付给客户。
